verses.verse: And when the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H596>complained<s%>, it <S%H7451>displeased<s%> <S%H241><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> it; and his <S%H639>anger<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%>; and the <S%H784>fire<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1197>burnt<s%> among them, and <S%H398>consumed<s%> them that were in the uttermost <S%H7097>parts<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%>. complained: or, were as it were complainers it displeased: Heb. it was evil in the ears of

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6817>cried<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>; and when <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6419>prayed<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, the <S%H784>fire<s%> was <S%H8257>quenched<s%>. was: Heb. sunk

And he <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H1931>the<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H8404>Taberah<s%>: because the <S%H784>fire<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1197>burnt<s%> among them. Taberah: that is, A burning

And the mixt <S%H628>multitude<s%> that was <S%H7130>among<s%> them fell a <S%H183>lusting<s%> <S%H8378><s%>: and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> also <S%H1058>wept<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Who shall give us <S%H1320>flesh<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%>? fell: Heb. lusted a lust wept: Heb. returned and wept

We <S%H2142>remember<s%> the <S%H1710>fish<s%>, which we did <S%H398>eat<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H2600>freely<s%>; the <S%H7180>cucumbers<s%>, and the <S%H20>melons<s%>, and the <S%H2682>leeks<s%>, and the <S%H1211>onions<s%>, and the <S%H7762>garlick<s%>:
But now our <S%H5315>soul<s%> is dried <S%H3002>away<s%>: there is nothing at all, <S%H1115>beside<s%> this <S%H4478>manna<s%>, before our <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.

And the <S%H4478>manna<s%> was as <S%H1407>coriander<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%>, and the <S%H5869>colour<s%> thereof as the <S%H5869>colour<s%> of <S%H916>bdellium<s%>. colour thereof: Heb. eye of it as the eye of

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> went <S%H7751>about<s%>, and <S%H3950>gathered<s%> it, and <S%H2912>ground<s%> it in <S%H7347>mills<s%>, or <S%H1743>beat<s%> it in a <S%H4085>mortar<s%>, and <S%H1310>baked<s%> it in <S%H6517>pans<s%>, and <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H5692>cakes<s%> of it: and the <S%H2940>taste<s%> of it was as the <S%H2940>taste<s%> of <S%H3955>fresh<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%>.
And when the <S%H2919>dew<s%> <S%H3381>fell<s%> upon the <S%H4264>camp<s%> in the <S%H3915>night<s%>, the <S%H4478>manna<s%> <S%H3381>fell<s%> upon it.

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1058>weep<s%> throughout their <S%H4940>families<s%>, every <S%H376>man<s%> in the <S%H6607>door<s%> of his <S%H168>tent<s%>: and the <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> <S%H3966>greatly<s%>; <S%H4872>Moses<s%> also was <S%H7489>displeased<s%> <S%H5869><s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, Wherefore hast thou <S%H7489>afflicted<s%> thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>? and wherefore have I not <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>favour<s%> in thy <S%H5869>sight<s%>, that thou <S%H7760>layest<s%> the <S%H4853>burden<s%> of all this <S%H5971>people<s%> upon me?

Have I <S%H2029>conceived<s%> all this <S%H5971>people<s%>? have I <S%H3205>begotten<s%> them, that thou shouldest <S%H559>say<s%> unto me, <S%H5375>Carry<s%> them in thy <S%H2436>bosom<s%>, as a nursing <S%H539>father<s%> <S%H5375>beareth<s%> the sucking <S%H3243>child<s%>, unto the <S%H127>land<s%> which thou <S%H7650>swarest<s%> unto their <S%H1>fathers<s%>?

<S%H370>Whence<s%> should I have <S%H1320>flesh<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> unto all this <S%H5971>people<s%>? for they <S%H1058>weep<s%> unto me, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H5414>Give<s%> us <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, that we may <S%H398>eat<s%>.
I am not <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H5375>bear<s%> all this <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H905>alone<s%>, because it is too <S%H3515>heavy<s%> for me.

And if thou <S%H6213>deal<s%> thus with me, <S%H2026>kill<s%> me, I pray thee, out of <S%H2026>hand<s%>, if I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>favour<s%> in thy <S%H5869>sight<s%>; and let me not <S%H7200>see<s%> my <S%H7451>wretchedness<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H622>Gather<s%> unto me <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, whom thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%> to be the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and <S%H7860>officers<s%> over them; and <S%H3947>bring<s%> them unto the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>, that they may <S%H3320>stand<s%> there with thee.

And I will come <S%H3381>down<s%> and <S%H1696>talk<s%> with thee there: and I will <S%H680>take<s%> of the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> which is upon thee, and will <S%H7760>put<s%> it upon them; and they shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H4853>burden<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> with thee, that thou <S%H5375>bear<s%> it not thyself alone.

And <S%H559>say<s%> thou unto the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H6942>Sanctify<s%> yourselves against to <S%H4279>morrow<s%>, and ye shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%>: for ye have <S%H1058>wept<s%> in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Who shall give us <S%H1320>flesh<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%>? for it was <S%H2895>well<s%> with us in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: therefore the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, and ye shall <S%H398>eat<s%>.

Ye shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, nor two <S%H3117>days<s%>, nor <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, neither <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, nor <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>;

But even a whole <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H3117><s%>, until it come <S%H3318>out<s%> at your <S%H639>nostrils<s%>, and it be <S%H2214>loathsome<s%> unto you: <S%H3282>because<s%> that ye have <S%H3988>despised<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> which is <S%H7130>among<s%> you, and have <S%H1058>wept<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Why came we <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>? whole: Heb. month of days

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, The <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H7130>among<s%> whom I am, are <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7273>footmen<s%>; and thou hast <S%H559>said<s%>, I will <S%H5414>give<s%> them <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, that they may <S%H398>eat<s%> a <S%H3117>whole<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>.

Shall the <S%H6629>flocks<s%> and the <S%H1241>herds<s%> be <S%H7819>slain<s%> for them, to <S%H4672>suffice<s%> them? or shall all the <S%H1709>fish<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> be gathered <S%H622>together<s%> for them, to <S%H4672>suffice<s%> them?

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, Is the <S%H3068>LORD'S<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> waxed <S%H7114>short<s%>? thou shalt <S%H7200>see<s%> now whether my <S%H1697>word<s%> shall come to <S%H7136>pass<s%> unto thee or not.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%>, and <S%H1696>told<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H622>gathered<s%> the <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and <S%H5975>set<s%> them round <S%H5439>about<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came <S%H3381>down<s%> in a <S%H6051>cloud<s%>, and <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto him, and <S%H680>took<s%> of the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> that was upon him, and <S%H5414>gave<s%> it unto the <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H2205>elders<s%> <S%H376><s%>: and it came to pass, that, when the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H5117>rested<s%> upon them, they <S%H5012>prophesied<s%>, and did not <S%H3254>cease<s%>.

But there <S%H7604>remained<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> in the <S%H4264>camp<s%>, the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H259>one<s%> was <S%H419>Eldad<s%>, and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H4312>Medad<s%>: and the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H5117>rested<s%> upon them; and they were of them that were <S%H3789>written<s%>, but went not <S%H3318>out<s%> unto the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%>: and they <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> in the <S%H4264>camp<s%>.

And there <S%H7323>ran<s%> a young <S%H5288>man<s%>, and <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H419>Eldad<s%> and <S%H4312>Medad<s%> do <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> in the <S%H4264>camp<s%>.

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%>, the <S%H8334>servant<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, one of his young <S%H979>men<s%>, <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%>, My <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H3607>forbid<s%> them.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H7065>Enviest<s%> thou for my sake? would God that all <S%H5414>the<s%> <S%H3068>LORD'S<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H5030>prophets<s%>, and that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> would <S%H5414>put<s%> his <S%H7307>spirit<s%> upon them!
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H622>gat<s%> him into the <S%H4264>camp<s%>, he and the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And there went <S%H5265>forth<s%> a <S%H7307>wind<s%> from the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H1468>brought<s%> <S%H7958>quails<s%> from the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, and let them <S%H5203>fall<s%> by the <S%H4264>camp<s%>, as it were a <S%H3117>day's<s%> <S%H1870>journey<s%> on this <S%H3541>side<s%>, and as it were a <S%H3117>day's<s%> <S%H1870>journey<s%> on the other <S%H3541>side<s%>, round <S%H5439>about<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%>, and as it were two <S%H520>cubits<s%> high upon the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>. as it were a day's: Heb. as it were the way of a day

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> stood <S%H6965>up<s%> all that <S%H3117>day<s%>, and all that <S%H3915>night<s%>, and all the <S%H4283>next<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, and they <S%H622>gathered<s%> the <S%H7958>quails<s%>: he that gathered <S%H4591>least<s%> <S%H622>gathered<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H2563>homers<s%>: and they <S%H7849>spread<s%> them all <S%H7849>abroad<s%> for themselves round <S%H5439>about<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%>.

And while the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> was <S%H2962>yet<s%> between their <S%H8127>teeth<s%>, ere it was <S%H3772>chewed<s%>, the <S%H639>wrath<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> with a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4347>plague<s%>.

And he <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of that <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H6914>Kibrothhattaavah<s%>: because there they <S%H6912>buried<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H183>lusted<s%>. Kibrothhattaavah: that is, The graves of lust
